title: Amazing Sublet Opportunity: Professional Creative/Office Space
posting_body: An amazing opportunity to sublet a professional creative space with a furnished Conference Room, Two Private offices for Executive work space, a soundproof editing, podcast room and a huge area to create, build products or use as product storage and warehousing.
Furnished lounge area, Reception area and bathroom as well.
Parking easily available at the front entrance.
We are so busy with our business we are not there and wish to sublet for one year.
Opportunity to extend after one year optional.
Utilities and High Speed Internet included.
This is a great opportunity to grow your dream business at a terrific price and in a great location near Henderson and Las Vegas.
